scripts.wasm-watch: cd image-processor && cargo watch -s 'wasm-pack build --target web --dev --no-typescript -- --color=always && rm pkg/.gitignore'
scripts.compile-wasm: wasm-pack build --target web --release --no-typescript image-processor && rm image-processor/pkg/.gitignore
scripts.compile-min-elm: elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=main.js && uglifyjs main.js --compress 'pure_funcs="F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9",pure_getters,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps,unsafe' | uglifyjs --mangle --output main.js
scripts.compile-all: yarn run compile-min-elm && yarn run compile-wasm
